column3: THE PEPPER CONCERTS HISTORY PAGES:                       BY MATTHEW MINORS

column4: Seperate bands with "/" try to remove white space where possible
column6:
Notes: To match songs to bands, they must be exactly like the are in the band col). Band is after the =
e.g "Song = Band Name/Other Band Name/Person Name"

Sgt. Pepper (Reprise) = Lonely Hearts Club
A Day In the Life = Lonely Hearts Club/James Hannaway
